name.en: Yukai na Rin no Kitsunebi Yurara
name.ja: <ruby>愉<rt>ゆ</rt></ruby><ruby>怪<rt>かい</rt></ruby>な<ruby>燐<rt>りん</rt></ruby>のきつねびゆらら
name.ja_romaji: Yukai na Rin no Kitsunebi Yurara

text.en: All face-up monsters on the field become FIRE. If this card is in your GY and your opponent has a FIRE monster on their field or in their GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Yukai na Rin no Kitsunebi Yurara" once per turn.
